thread.title: Kellogg Sees a Bright Future for Cereal
thread.title_full: Kellogg Sees a Bright Future for Cereal - WSJ

author: Annie Gasparro
title: Kellogg Sees a Bright Future for Cereal
text:
Chief Executive John Bryant says he is optimistic about Kellogg Co.’s future. Yet some analysts have been outspoken about their own doubts.
“I’m struck by how positive you are,” Kurt Feuerman, a portfolio manager at AllianceBernstein LP, which held about 1% of Kellogg’s shares as of June 30, told Mr. Bryant during a May conference call. “How does management justify its lack of urgency and direction in light of continued lackluster...
